Installation

CellNeighborEX requires Python version >=3.8, <3.11. We recommend using conda environment to avoid dependency conflicts. The dependencies are listed in requirements.txt, which can be downloaded from https://github.com/hkim240/CellNeighborEX. Cloning the CellNeighborEX repository from GitHub is also available.

Create conda environment “myenv”:

conda create -n myenv python=3.10
conda activate myenv

Navigate into the directory where requirements.txt is located. Then, install dependencies:

pip install -r requirements.txt

Install CellNeighborEX from PyPI:

pip install CellNeighborEX
